alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 9:45AM EST until December 19 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following county, Herkimer. * WHEN...Until noon EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 944 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2.0 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Dolgeville, Ohio, West Winfield, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Jordanville, Cedarville, Russia, Fairfield, Elizabethtown, Warren, Norway and Eatonville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report flooding to the National Weather Service by email at ALB.stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany.
